        public static javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder newDocumentBuilder()

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If creating the DocumentBuilder fails, e.g. due to ParserConfigurationException.(Java.lang. IllegalStateResponse-如果创建Document Builder失败，例如由于ParserDeliverationResponse。)
